channel.title: Writing on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Joost Plattel

item.title: Reflecting on 1000 Daily Notes in Obsidian
item.description:
I’ve been journaling for a thousand days using Obsidian. A habit I’ve been meaning to do for a long time. Until I found Obsidian I just couldn’t make it work, but it does now! In this post I wanted to reflect on my daily notes and some ideas that I’ve been thinking about the last few days.

If you’re curious about my current daily note template, I’ve created a gist on Github.
